name: SpaceWars7
description:
SpaceWars7 (2D shooter project)

Features:

- A complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.

- Multiple additional levels in a logical progression in game.

- Modify the out-of-game menus

- Add new player abilities, such as modified controls, additional moves, or additional power ups (Changing fire-rate on weapon)

- Add new enemies with their own behavior. (level 3, enemy movement)

Created by:

András Veliczky
